content: i have made lots of these crochet hats and donated them to loving hands charity crafters there are 3 sizes ~ large preemie medium preemie small preemie and links to extra-small micro-preemie and angel baby so quick and easy to do each hat requires ~ a small amount of dk yarn 4mm hook or 3 5mm hook sweet and little hats are always needed **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
